attributes.action: Turn the millenum dome into a giant  youth centre.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: full of things that youths actually want to do football tornements( other sport or game tornements) a shoping centre, food court, gigs and night clubs where the drinking age inside is lowered to 16 so youths so we can get pissed without trying to be snidey and obviously have it monitered by some sort of authority just lookng over everyone (like bouncers) so any fights your gone and a sercrity check maybe metal alarms to be used on everyone that goes in(the whole place not just the night clubs) see how it goes if it works make more, so teenagers are not on the streets but having alot of fun in there free time. if you dont like the idea of the night clubs think about it its not everywhere, just one place.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
